name: Hentai Story Red - Wallpapers
detailed_description:
This add-on allows you to download 10 arts with girls in underwear! Each art has an image resolution of 1920:1080 pixels. These arts are perfect for installing them on your desktop computer!

After the purchase and installation of DLC, in the folder with this game will be 10 arts without a watermark with the name of the game.

  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC contains Wallpapers that depict girls in their underwear.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.
